com.complexible.common.io.block

Class BlockSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.io.block.BlockSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable<BlockSpec>

    public class BlockSpec
extends Object
implements Copyable<BlockSpec>
    Formatting specification of a block defining the markers, indentation level, and newlines.
